ai-consulting.title: AI Consulting & Implementation
ai-consulting.description: Strategic AI guidance from practitioners who've built real NLP and document processing systems.
ai-consulting.fullDescription: We provide AI consulting backed by hands-on experience building production systems with LangChain, LlamaIndex, and modern language models. Our team has developed everything from resume extraction applications to intelligent chatbots that answer complex domain-specific questions. We help you identify practical AI opportunities, design system architectures using proven frameworks, and implement solutions that deliver immediate value. Our approach is rooted in real development experience—we understand what works in production and can guide you through the technical and business challenges of AI adoption. Whether you need to evaluate AI tools, design RAG systems, or train your team on modern AI frameworks, we provide guidance based on actual implementation experience.

ROI analysis and business case development

Proof of concept development and validation
RAG system design and implementation strategy

Future-proof your business operations

document-processing.title: Intelligent Document Processing
document-processing.description: AI-powered document extraction and analysis systems that understand context and structure.
document-processing.fullDescription: Transform your document workflows with intelligent processing systems we've proven in real-world applications. Our expertise includes building resume extraction applications that process PDF and DOCX files with remarkable accuracy, extracting structured data that integrates seamlessly with your existing systems. We leverage LangChain for document processing pipelines, OpenAI APIs for intelligent analysis, and custom parsing logic to handle complex document formats. Our solutions go beyond simple OCR—they understand context, extract meaningful entities, and adapt to different document structures. We build user-friendly interfaces with Streamlit for easy deployment and provide structured JSON outputs. Each solution includes proper dependency management through Python Poetry and comprehensive error handling for production reliability.
features: Resume and CV automated parsing and analysis
Intelligent information extraction with context understanding
Structured JSON output for seamless integration
Batch processing capabilities for large document volumes
benefits: Process hundreds of documents in minutes
Achieve 95%+ accuracy in information extraction
Eliminate manual data entry errors
Integrate seamlessly with existing HR and business systems
useCases: Recruitment agencies automate resume screening with 95% accuracy, reducing processing time from hours to minutes
HR departments streamline candidate evaluation, improving hiring efficiency by 80%
Legal firms extract key information from contracts and agreements automatically
Insurance companies process claims documents with minimal human intervention
Educational institutions automate transcript and application processing

testimonials.quote: Automation transformed our operations. We now process 10x more applications with the same team.

conversational-ai.title: Conversational AI & Chatbots
conversational-ai.description: Intelligent chatbots that provide accurate, context-aware responses using RAG and modern LLMs.
conversational-ai.fullDescription: Build sophisticated conversational AI systems using the same technologies we've used to create production chatbots for specialized domains. Our expertise includes developing chatbots that answer complex questions by combining large language models with retrieval-augmented generation (RAG). We've built systems that understand game characters, coaching strategies, and business processes, demonstrating our ability to work with specialized knowledge domains. Our solutions leverage LangChain for workflow orchestration, LlamaIndex for efficient data retrieval, and FAISS vector databases for semantic search. We implement web scraping for data collection, embeddings for semantic understanding, and custom retrievers for precise information extraction. Every chatbot includes proper prompt engineering, response validation, and continuous learning capabilities.
features: Domain-specific chatbot development with specialized knowledge
Real-time conversation handling with context awareness
Custom prompt engineering and response optimization
Web scraping for dynamic knowledge updates
Interactive Streamlit interfaces for easy deployment
benefits: Provide 24/7 customer support with specialized knowledge
Reduce response time by 80% while maintaining accuracy
Handle complex queries that require domain expertise
Scale customer interactions without increasing support staff

nlp-text-processing.title: Advanced NLP & Text Intelligence
nlp-text-processing.description: Sophisticated text processing systems that understand, analyze, and extract insights from unstructured data.
nlp-text-processing.fullDescription: Transform unstructured text into actionable business intelligence with advanced NLP systems built on proven frameworks. Our expertise includes developing text processing pipelines that handle everything from sentiment analysis to complex entity extraction. We've built systems that process resumes, analyze customer feedback, and extract structured information from various document types. Our solutions use modern transformer models, custom embeddings, and semantic search capabilities to understand context and meaning. We implement proper text preprocessing, feature extraction, and validation to ensure high-quality results. Every NLP system includes confidence scoring, bias detection, and explainability features so you can trust the insights and decisions your text intelligence systems provide.
features: Resume and CV parsing and analysis
benefits: Extract actionable insights from customer feedback
Automate resume screening and candidate matching
Improve customer engagement with personalized content
Enhance decision-making with data-driven insights

ai-infrastructure.title: AI Application Infrastructure
ai-infrastructure.description: Scalable deployment and infrastructure for AI applications using modern frameworks and cloud platforms.
ai-infrastructure.fullDescription: Deploy your AI applications with confidence using infrastructure patterns we've tested in production. Our experience includes deploying Streamlit applications, managing vector databases, and creating scalable API endpoints for AI models. We focus on practical deployment solutions that work reliably without unnecessary complexity. Our infrastructure approach emphasizes proper dependency management with Python Poetry, efficient vector storage with FAISS, and user-friendly interfaces that your team can actually use. We implement monitoring, logging, and version control strategies that keep your AI applications running smoothly. Whether you need to deploy a document processing system or scale a conversational AI application, we build infrastructure that's both robust and maintainable.
features: Vector database setup and management (FAISS, Pinecone)
API development for AI model serving
Cloud deployment on AWS and Azure
Monitoring and logging for AI applications
Version control and CI/CD for AI projects
benefits: Deploy AI applications quickly and reliably
Scale from prototype to production seamlessly
Ensure consistent performance under load
Maintain applications with minimal downtime
